name: SentinelOps ⏱️ E2E Decision Latency SLO breach detected
message:
E2E Decision latency exceeded configured SLO (SLO_PIPELINE_E2E_MS).

Runbook:
- Check stage latency heatmap (observer/thinker/doer)
- Correlate with queue_depth + tool_error + llm.latency
- Enable degraded behavior if repeated
